news_header: Bolsonaro denies coup charges related to 2022 election, claims political persecution, and aims for 2026 presidential run.
news_original_title: Brazil: Jair Bolsonaro deplores Lula coup plot charges
news_text: Former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro condemned criminal charges alleging his involvement in a coup plot against the 2022 election results. He claims these accusations are politically motivated and compares his situation to that of opposition leaders in other leftist countries. Bolsonaro aims to return to the presidency in 2026, despite being banned until 2030 due to previous allegations about Brazil's voting system. Lula, the current president, maintains that those charged are presumed innocent.
